website_summaries.verdict: Affordable white apron, fun to embellish; use for heavy-duty kitchen work or everyday.
pros: Great basic apron for super-low price
Simple white, 100% cotton material, spill resistant, and heavy duty for all kinds of work in the kitchen
Perfect for decorating with dye, fabric paint, embroidery to personalize or as fun craft project
cons: Some buyers complain about lack of pockets
Be careful about putting in dryer

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for my use
customer_reviews.text: In a moment of weakness, I bought two of these probably based only on price Upon washing it's obvious they are pure cotton which a.) Shrinks, and b.) Needs pressing. They come out of the dryer in terrible shape. (no care label attached). Go for something more expensive with some polyester, perhaps stain resistance. Strings are good and sound and sturdy, but the front is not satisfactory for wearing in retail environment without ironing, and probably starching. Cloth seems very absorbent. I'll use them for window washing.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderhill

customer_reviews.title: they do the job
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sloppy cook (and also a sloppy dish washer). So I got tired to having to have shirts laundered and slack dry cleaned so often. Voila! Buy an apron. These are what I bought. They seem to work fine. They are simple: no snaps or pockets. I'm only 5'11", so I could do with the neck strap being an inch or two shorter. I bought two so that I would have one to wear and one at the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S. R. Hill Jr.

customer_reviews.title: GET ONE WITH A POCKET
customer_reviews.text: This is a great apron for what it is. You always want white and you always want cloth, so you can see whats coming off and can wipe hands. Howver, I wish I would have sprang for one with a front pocket/pouch at the hips to keep some tools with me while I move around the kitchen... ( DO NOT BUY THE GREY/BLACK ones on Amazon ) the 2/$9 deal, they absolutely suck , always get a white material/cotton apron.... The mesh fiber is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tie dying!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many of these aprons I can't even begin to tell you how many I've purchased. They are strong material, 100% cotton and look beautiful tie dyed. The color holds really well and the material allows for a lot of detail tie dying. I will continue to purchase these as every apron I've dyed has easily sold and customers have wonderful things to say about these!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cheap
customer_reviews.text: They are all cotton, so they are absorbent (way better than 50/50 blends), if you're the type to wipe your hands in your apron all the time. I'm 6'4" and find them adequately long. I bought 3, and liked them enough to buy more. Cheaper than replacing stained shirts all the time.
customer_reviews.author: buy2much

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for embroidery
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. The fabric is 100% cotton and is soft and light. I prefer a lighter fabric over the poly/cotton stiff twills that are out there. I embroidered it, then washed it and it came out great. Yes, it is cotton and needs to be pressed. But for anyone who actually uses an apron when cooking, you will understand why cotton beats polyester every time. For anyone who is embroidering, I used Terial Magic as the stabilizer and it worked perfectly. My one and only complaint is that the neck band is not adjustable. But for this price, I can get over it. I will be purchasing many more.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: A nice, cheap, all-cotton apron, great for decorating or wearingto dye/paint
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the full range of aprons out there, these are about a 3, average size, on the thin side, decent manufacturing. For the price, they're a shiny 5 stars. And since all-cotton aprons are getting harder to find (most commercial aprons in this price range are a bit roomier, but usually 70/30 or at best 50/50 poly/cotton), if you want something to dye or paint (or dye or paint in--so it will get satisfyingly stained with your efforts), this is an excellent choice. If you want a cooking apron, the poly blend options are probably a better choice, as 100% cotton gets dingy quickly, even with bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Worked great as a costume piece
customer_reviews.text: Very light material, not sure how this would last for everyday use. I used it for a Flo from Progressive costume, it took well to regular Crayola washable markers for the "progressive" I drew on the front, and held up well through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dunkler

customer_reviews.title: A great cooking apron!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron to make my own design on with markers. The sharpie blead a little but I really liked the effect. It covers my clothes when I cook and the back tie is in the right place. No complaints. Although I did shorten the neck loop to better fit my size and it made it so much better!
customer_reviews.author: johnnyd713

customer_reviews.title: will order again!
customer_reviews.text: These aprons are wonderful! Once they arrived I immediately washed them and dried them with low heat. I knew they would shrink a little since they are 100% cotton. They shrank a little bit. Also ironed-up easily and fast. Now they fit my middle school age kids perfect and are great for our cooking class. I had each of them monogrammed and they look WONDERFUL! Very pleased and will order these again next year for the cooking class!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Quality Aprons.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for home use and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of craftsmanship. They're not too heavy but they're not the flimsy cotton aprons I've used in restaurants or cooking school either. If I were to need another apron I would by this same brand again.
customer_reviews.author: RRodriguez-Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Long and strong
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily use apron. Basic, strong, good material, easily washable, and extra long for those tall people
customer_reviews.author: Connor McKenzy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift idea
customer_reviews.text: For our 12 year old grandson who aspires to be a chef, as a birthday present. Added a chef's hat and a chef's jacket, so the whole culinary package was a HUGE hit! All the products were heavy duty cotton of very good quality. We added black iron on letters to spell out his name - just like on Master Chef. He now stays after school twice a week for cooking classes; this was a fabulous present and a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product was exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I make biscuits for a local chain restaurant and this full cotton apron will be easy to keep clean of the oils that I occasionally get from brushing past the grill surfaces. The fit was easily adjustable for a wide range of sizes. I'm a big woman, so I have lots of curves to adjust to :-) I'm very pleased with the value here.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: The cotton was a good quality. Unable to comment on durability as I used it for a "Flo - Progressive Halloween costume. The apron was large for me (I am short), but I expected it to be as I read the reviews. It was very easy to hem.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Construction
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these aprons to embroider but they are so off center and lopsided that I won't be able to use them. I guess they'd be ok if you just want to wear them as is, as long as you don't mind one side wrapping around a lot more than the other. Quality of material is ok, but they are very carelessly constructed. These are NOT the same Aunt Martha's Classic White Apron found at Colonial Patterns. I will go back to ordering these from them. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Boone

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: arrived timely. simple and plain and not top of the line and not crap. I bought for a Halloween prop so I bloodied mine up so not sure how well it stands up to wear and washing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose apron
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this apron for use as a bartender and it works great! ● Good solid material used ● Stands up to daily washing and drying in a washing machine ● Great price
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: "And I thought I needed glasses"
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of them one was perfect the other was cut and sewn off bias...it was short on one side and longer on the other...the left chest armhole area was shorter than the same area on the right side...was making decorative aprons for a gift and could not even use this one as it would have been crooked when worn...not sure who the quality control inspector was for that one but they surely missed their mark.
customer_reviews.author: AT,GA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a professional kitchen. I’m 5’3 and it’s definitely on the longer side, but I just folded the middle a little and it was perfect, kept my Chef coat and pants underneath clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten B.

customer_reviews.title: Great chef apron
customer_reviews.text: I really like this apron. It’s so useful in the kitchen for cooking and washing dishes (since I use bleach). I had to cut the halter part around the neck because there was no way to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingAround

customer_reviews.title: Good apron, good price, get one.
customer_reviews.text: It's just an apron people. It keeps stuff off your clothes. It's good for crafts and kitchens. Get one, decorate it if you want but it's still just an apron.
customer_reviews.author: Needalot.

customer_reviews.title: Basic apron, qood quality
customer_reviews.text: Just a basic apron. Only bought it for a costume. I thought it would be a terrible flimsy fabric but its not. Just a nice cotton apron thats prettt much it!
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: Used for a Bob's Burgers costume. Its an apron, its white; what else should I review? Going to use for regular use in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: RynWil

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Inexpensive Cotton Aprons
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, reasonable priced 100% cotton aprons. I have 4 sisters & am hand embroidering an apron for each one. They are turning out so beautifully! My sisters will cherish them & I'm also doing one for myself! Maureen Sayre
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Good quality apron
customer_reviews.text: This fits just right. The long ties go all the way around my waist to tie in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Big Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Good apron
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my fiancé’s Bob costume from Bob’s Burgers. Seemed to be made well. Keeping it for future cooking on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Con

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: It's fine quality, I bought it for a halloween costume and I wasn't disappointed. It's certainly the right size for adults, a bit long on me, in fact. The material is thin but durable.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good apron, a little pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Good, basic apron. It was a little pricey for how basic it was, but it had prime shipping, so there is that. The strings that wrap to tie around the apron seem that they could fray easily, but overall the apron was what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: N. N.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel like a baker. I do a lot of bread baking and this lets me take off the apron and still be able to go out in public without being covered in flour.
customer_reviews.author: Zaphoid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a project.
customer_reviews.text: This was nice material for the price. I used this product to make a personalized apron with heat transfer! So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: chef
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it came quickly and neatly, so I could send it off to be embroidered ( it was a gift).
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Stay cool in 100% cotton!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive cotton apron, for home use, but restaurant style. Super functional, great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joesie

customer_reviews.title: Item is just as described
customer_reviews.text: Got for an olden day outfit for my kiddo at school. Worked great. Item is just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was still perfect for my boyfriends Bob Belcher cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Even though it didn't have the breast pocket, it was still perfect for my boyfriends Bob Belcher cosplay. I ended up drawing a pocket a pen on it, but it still looked cute overall.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: NEATNESS COUNTS
customer_reviews.text: I really needed to quit wiping my hands on my pants when I was preparing food.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood T. Fudpucker

customer_reviews.title: Arrived stained.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a stain on it but my husband doesn’t seem to care. I would have exchanged it.
customer_reviews.author: aann

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son bloodied it up and used with guys leatherface mask.. Worked well
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: Tie dyed a bunch of these for Christmas while stuck home. Fun project.
customer_reviews.author: Alison H.

customer_reviews.title: but it is so nice I will be a bit sad when it begins ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I could have hoped for at anywhere near the price. The fabric is substantial, and the waist tie is made of something sturdier than just a double thickness of the fabric. I plan to use it in my shop, but it is so nice I will be a bit sad when it begins to pick up stains from the things it is intended to protect me from.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerJoe

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to personalize with vinyl. I washed it first and the tie string shredded. Unfortunately I did not have time to replace it and had to go ahead and give it as a gift but explain why it was tattered. So embarrassing!
customer_reviews.author: tapper

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen basic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Bob’s Burgers Halloween costume. Such a quality fabric apron that now I use it to cook!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Way too big/large
customer_reviews.text: Great material and all but fit too large on me. It is also not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Perfect apron for avoiding mess on my clothes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect apron for avoiding mess on my clothes. Long straps to tie around my size 38 waist with strap to spare. Long enough that would work well for folks taller than me
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M. Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Apron
customer_reviews.text: Nice summer shop apron. Wish I would have purchased the 2-Pack..
customer_reviews.author: phil j schneider

customer_reviews.title: A prop for a photo, but it continues to be used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron to serve as a prop for a photo shoot, but now I use it in my kitchen. It is a basic apron, but the material was sturdy and continues to stand up to use. The delivery service was great. It was delivered as agreed and at the price I was quoted. Great job all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Love

customer_reviews.title: Add on item only now
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but they get dirty pretty easy and you can no longer buy 1-4 by themselves because it’s only an add on item for orders $25 and over just to save 53 cents. They were $6 before but now they’re $5.47 as an add on item only.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for shrinkage
customer_reviews.text: I used this for part of a halloween costume. it worked great for that and then I washed it. I made the mistake of putting it in the dryer and it shrunk by almost half.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS APRON
customer_reviews.text: Will be buying more from this shop! I love this apron. Very durable, very affordable, very comfy, and fits perfect. Lots of room. Fits all sizes! Won’t be disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Chasen

customer_reviews.title: Shrunken shriveled mess
customer_reviews.text: This apron looked beautiful when I opened the package but as instructed I prewashed it (according to instructions) before applying a transfer. Unfortunately when washed the size was noticeablely smaller and I could not get the wrinkles out. No good for embroidery transfers.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: No pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Light quality of cloth. Cheap cost. Low rating because I was under the impression that it had pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Bo

customer_reviews.title: Bought to tie dye
customer_reviews.text: Bought this apron to tie dye and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Katie Asselin

customer_reviews.title: Great apron
customer_reviews.text: Used for a costume of Flo and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Andie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Same as all the others
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a thick, sturdy apron. I had a great one for a bunch of years, but can never find another it seems. Thought I'd take a chance with this. There's really nothing wrong with it except it's about as thick as a t-shirt. Seems to be the way with most of the aprons out there.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Overall great apron
customer_reviews.text: Material feels durable and not cheap. Long and easy to bake/ cook in
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for crikut project
customer_reviews.text: Worked great as custom made gift for friends. Great price and great quality. Perfect for projects
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Leigh Drobet

customer_reviews.title: Great for costumes.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my husband’s Bob Belcher costume and my Linda Belcher costume.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bartig

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because my son was a baker in a play. Couldn't find a plan white one anywhere local. Worked great for the play and now my wife wears it in the kitchen when she cooks. Does a great job doing what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, quality, and size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and size for the price. I am 6'4" and needed an apron for a Halloween butcher costume. This fit great, and it was so cheap that I didn't mind cutting and "bloodying" it up for the 1-time use role. I might actually get another for normal use.
customer_reviews.author: YupYup

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wedding shower as the sign in book.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Crnkovic

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the low price here, this apron is perfect for light duty use. I use 2-3 times a week and it has held up good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Williams

customer_reviews.title: a reasonably priced sturdy apron.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, a reasonably priced sturdy apron. The strings are plenty long enough to wrap around the back and tie in the front. I am 5'10" and the apron comes down to just below my knees. I also like that it is 100% cotton. The seller sent it to me in a very reasonable amount of time. Completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Halloween costume item
customer_reviews.text: It's everything I needed it to be for my Overcooked Halloween costume. The size is slightly big on me, but I'm short so I expected that.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Best Apron
customer_reviews.text: All I wanted was a professional grade white cotton apron. This is it. It's perfect. It's soft, has long ties, it is very affordable and it does exactly what I need it to do. I am going to order a few more. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Kostjukoff

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Thin bleached white cotton. Good size for adult male. Used for a tie dye and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: VJShil

customer_reviews.title: Great buy especially for personalization
customer_reviews.text: Love this apron. I personalized it for my youtube videos.
customer_reviews.author: janice Myles

customer_reviews.title: Worked good forbua
customer_reviews.text: Used for my son to draw on for a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our work place BBQ master. Use with fabric pens to create a memorable retirement gift (or at least that's the plan!).
customer_reviews.author: CM Craig

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a plain white apron for a Halloween costume and didn't want to spend a lot of money. This apron was perfect. Very reasonable for a part of a costume. It is 100% cotton and it did wrinkle when I washed it but that really wasn't a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a pocket on one side so that ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a pocket on one side so that it's easier to keep track of the side I originally had facing outward. It serves its purpose though in keeping my clothes from being splashed on when I'm cooking.
customer_reviews.author: El Diablo Robotico

customer_reviews.title: A good apron for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality cotton apron, basic but effective. My only criticism of it was that the waist ties could be a little bit longer. I have a 36 inch waist, and they work, but there is not very much material to make a knot with.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK D.J. OBRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and altered it for a Mikan Tsumiki cosplay. Not the best quality, but it's all I could work with. It works just fine for me, but if you're looking to use it like I did, I would recommend just getting something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive apron
customer_reviews.text: Good inexpensive apron. I bought this for a skit as part of a presentation so I did not want to spend a lot of money on it. It's good enough for the purpose with long enough apron strings to tie in front. If you want to use this day-to-day then order several in case it gets too stained.
customer_reviews.author: Greg From Oro Valley AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing well made and was great for my costume this year!!
customer_reviews.author: Bleh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: We performed a civil war reenactment for class and these aprons worked great! We got them bloodied up for effect and they were just perfect! We got an A and a standing applause! Perfect for our project!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gerken

customer_reviews.title: Dirty... but was supposed to be brand new
customer_reviews.text: This apron was sealed in plastic, but was somehow dirty... looked used then repackaged... there were dirt stains on the front and up the side. we didn't have time to return and buy a new one, so we just washed it and wore it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love how this turned out. Excellent quality and size.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Thin material, barely keeps stains off, doesn’t absorb any water - essentially like having no apron.
customer_reviews.author: Jon N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect man sized apron. great apron to personalize for someone special using paint!!!
customer_reviews.author: michal berger

customer_reviews.title: Neck strap is way too long and not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Bought as a project to paint, but the neck is way too long. Will have to sew it to make it fit properly
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kittleson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for Halloween costumes. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel M

customer_reviews.title: nice plain apron
customer_reviews.text: I got these to embroider and decorate with Sharpies, as xmas presents. They have turned out great. Using regular sharpies, not fabric ones, seems just fine -- my 9 year old has made a very nice design on the one for Grandma, and it hasn't bled on the fabric. not adjustable at neck, but you could always tie it with a knot if it's too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: This would be great to customize for a friend. Quality was awesome, fit my 6’6 bf perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used them for our Bob's Burger's costume and they were great! They don't have pockets but they still work great!
customer_reviews.author: Evita Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, good quality material and nice design. Embroidered beautifully. Will order again. Christine in Winfield
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mc Elroy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality apron
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a Halloween costume and put some HTV on it. It held up really well and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a cotton apron at a great price - these are a great purchase. Thank you for not being cheap and thin!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: A+ Apron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to a coworker. The apron is good quality. I was able to put an iron on transfer on it with no problems. It worked great for a welcome back to work gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jan R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice quality...am teaching my granddaughter how to cross stitch on these
customer_reviews.author: woodenkar

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great price... I used this for a Halloween outfit on my husband who is 5’11” and it fit perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not the heaviest fabric around but it appears of good quality. The apron has not been put to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the heaviest fabric around but it appears of good quality. The apron has not been put to the test yet but I believe it will be up to the task for normal household cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Techbum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap costume piece, durability concerns
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap piece for my halloween costume. The draw strings in the back are cheap, though. Frayed after one use. I wouldn't expect this to last more than a few washes. But if you're looking to finish a costume, it'll work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Confused Middle-aged White Male

customer_reviews.title: Super for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. I bought 3. Poly blend washes nicely. Be sure to tie knots in the ends before you wash to prevent unravelling.
customer_reviews.author: Elvee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: no complaints - this is shielding what needs shielded, and for cheap. waist string can be wrapped around and tied in the front, which lets you tuck a towel in as well. not complicated or flammable, as near as I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Henry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for part of a Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for part of a Halloween costume. I’m 5’2” and the apron was very long on me. Definitely for someone taller.
customer_reviews.author: Blakely Blum

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a halloween costume. It is good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: We needed it for a school project. It was as described and expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wells

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and scratchy, but it worked perfectly for my Bob Belcher halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: J. PearsonTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong  :)
customer_reviews.text: Part of a costume but a great basic apron, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Baummer

customer_reviews.title: Great adult size apron
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a chef Halloween costume and it was perfect!

product_meta.title: Aunt Martha's 28-Inch by 35-Inch Cotton Kitchen Apron, White
product_meta.description: Size:36"L X 30"WThis 100-percent Cotton Twill Bib Apron is ultra spill resistant and perfect for all you hard core chefs or those who just love to dabble in cooking. Decorate this beautiful white apron with hand embroidery, fabric paints or use for numerous other craft projects.
feature_bullets: Can be decorated many ways such as by hand or machine embroidery or simply use as an every day apron
